  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:clao_es_20070119_2_0020703</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020703</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Paradigmas de la primera declinación griega</string>
            <string language="en">Paradigms of the Greek first declension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paradigmen der griechischen ersten Deklination</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Paradigmes de la première déclinaison grecque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Paradigms do primeiro declension grego</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Paradigmi della prima declinazione greca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραδείγματα της ελληνικής πρώτης κλίσης</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Esquema con los paradigmas declinados en singular y plural de la primera declinación, según el género femenino y masculino y sus diferentes tipos en alfa, en beta, etc</string>
            <string language="en">Scheme with the declined paradigms in singular and plural of the first declension, according to the grammatical gender of feminine, masculine or neuter and their different types in alpha, beta etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Griego</string>
            <string language="en">Greek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">primera declinación</string>
            <string language="en">first declension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">paradigmas</string>
            <string language="en">paradigms</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Scheme mit den gesunkenen Paradigmen in 
einzigartigem und Plural der ersten Deklination, entsprechend dem 
grammatischen Geschlecht von weiblichem, von männlichem oder von 
sächlichem und ihr unterschiedliches tippt Alpha, Betausw. ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Complotez avec les paradigmes diminués dans 
singulier et le pluriel de la première déclinaison, selon le genre 
grammatical de féminin, de masculin ou de neutre et leur différent 
saisit l'alpha, bêta etc...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planeje com os paradigms declinados em singular e 
o plural do primeiro declension, de acordo com o gender gramatical de 
feminine, de masculine ou de neutro e seu diferente datilografa dentro
o alfa, etc. beta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetti con i paradigmi ribassanti in singolare 
ed il plurale della prima declinazione, secondo il genere grammaticale
di femminile, di maschile o di neutro ed il loro differente digita 
dentro l'alfa, beta ecc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο με τα μειωμένα παραδείγματα στον ενικό αριθμό 
και τον πληθυντικό της πρώτης κλίσης, σύμφωνα με το γραμματικό 
γένος των θηλυκών, αρσενικών ή ουδέτερων και διαφορετικών τύπων
τους σε άλφα, βήτα κ.λπ....</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griechisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erste Deklination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paradigmen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Grec</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">première déclinaison</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">paradigmes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Grego</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">primeiro declension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">paradigms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Greco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">prima declinazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">paradigmi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελληνικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πρώτη κλίση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παραδείγματα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
